sentence.Network_en: One alternative to this solution is to implement an Occasionally Connected Application ( OCA ).

sentence.Network_en: A common extension type of OCA is the ability to support data collaboration between databases.
sentence.Network_cn: OCA一种常见的扩展是支持多个数据库之间的数据协作.

sentence.Network_en: How many events can each OCA member enter?
